main event: On January 6, 1965, a witness observed a luminous object hovering at low altitude in Pleasant Hill, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was approximately 200 ft in diameter and emitted a bluish-white glow., The object pulsed in color from red to white while hovering., The duration of the sighting was about 15-20 minutes., The object disappeared rapidly after remaining stationary for 2-3 minutes., The witness stated that no sound was heard during the event.
witness description: a reliable observer who reported the sighting after driving on Ohio Route 48.
